Support.title: Support co-sport.com
Support.subtitle: An independent project serving the sports community
Support.story_p1: co-sport.com was born from a passion for sport and a vision: to create an inclusive community where everyone can find their ideal sports partner.
Support.story_p2: Developed by a single passionate developer, this project is built with the ambition to make sport more accessible and safer for everyone, especially for women who want to practice safely.
Support.story_p3: To date, co-sport.com remains entirely free for all users. Our priority is to build a solid community above all.
Support.support_p1: To maintain this free service and continue developing new features, we rely on the support of our community. Here's how you can contribute:
Support.future_p1: In the future, co-sport.com may integrate targeted and non-intrusive ads or partnerships to maintain the service, but we are committed to always offering a quality experience.

Features.Title: It's simple! Here are the steps to follow:

Step1.Title: Filter ads according to your criteria to find the ideal partner.
Step1.SportWomenDesc: Are you a woman who wants to practice sports with other women? Thanks to our exclusive system, find sports partners near you safely.

Step2.Title: Find the ad that matches you
Step2.ExampleDescription: I'm looking for a workout partner to stay motivated and progress together. Available on weekdays after 6pm.

Step3.Title: Join the group and start practicing!
Step3.ExampleDescription: Complete workout program with warm-up, compound exercises and isolations. Suitable for all levels.
Step3.CoachDesc: Looking for a personal coach or professional guide? Book qualified experts directly: sports coaches, mountain guides, physical trainers and more.

Step4.Title: That's it! You can now start practicing with your new partners.

FAQ.Title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.Q1: How do I sign up for Co-Sport?
FAQ.A1: Signing up for Co-Sport is simple and free. Click the 'Sign up' button at the top of the page, fill in the form with your information and validate your account via the confirmation email.
FAQ.Q2: How do I find sports partners?
FAQ.A2: Use our search filters to find partners according to your criteria: sport, level, location, etc. You can then contact people directly or join their groups.
FAQ.A3: Yes, Co-Sport is completely free for basic features. We also offer a premium version with advanced features.
FAQ.Q4: How do I create an ad?
FAQ.A4: Once logged in, click on 'Create ad', choose your sport, set your criteria (level, schedule, location) and publish your ad.
FAQ.Q5: How does the level system work?
FAQ.A5: We use a simple system with three levels: Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced. Choose the level that best matches your practice in each sport.
FAQ.A6: You can contact us via the contact form in the 'Support' section or directly by email at support@co-sport.com

featurebox.featurebox_femmes_description: Are you a woman and want to practice sports with other women? Thanks to our exclusive system, only women have access to this feature. Find female sports partners near you, according to your level and preferences, in a safe and friendly environment.
featurebox.featurebox_femmes_short_description: Are you a woman and want to practice sports with other women? Thanks to our exclusive system, find female sports partners near you in complete safety.
featurebox.featurebox_femmes_keywords: women only sports, female sports partners, women's sports community, safe sports, find a sports partner
featurebox.featurebox_femmes_meta_description: Join a 100% female community to practice sports with trusted partners.
featurebox.featurebox_find_ad_title: Find the ad that suits you
featurebox.featurebox_find_ad_description: Are you looking for a sports partner who matches you? Thanks to our advanced filters and Strava data, you can find athletes by: your favorite sport (running, climbing, fitness, etc.), your level (beginner, intermediate, expert), your location and availability, your culture, nationality and language for maximum affinity. Whether you are looking for a running partner at your pace or a tennis player at your level, our algorithm finds the perfect match!
featurebox.featurebox_find_ad_short_description: Are you looking for a sports partner who matches you? Thanks to our advanced filters and Strava data, find athletes by sport, level, location and cultural affinities.
featurebox.featurebox_find_ad_keywords: find a sports partner, perfect sports match, sports by level and location, advanced sports filter, sports affinities
featurebox.featurebox_find_ad_meta_description: Use our smart filters to find a sports partner that matches your level, sport and culture.
featurebox.featurebox_coach_title: Find a sports coach or professional guide in a few clicks!
featurebox.featurebox_coach_description: Are you looking for a personal coach, a mountain guide or another sports professional? On our platform, you can directly book qualified experts according to your needs: Sports coaches (weight training, fitness, running, yoga…), mountain guides and specialized instructors, physical trainers and nutrition experts, sports teachers and professional supervisors. Compare profiles, read reviews and book the right professional easily.
featurebox.featurebox_coach_short_description: Are you looking for a personal coach or a professional guide? Book qualified experts directly: sports coaches, mountain guides, physical trainers and more.
featurebox.featurebox_coach_keywords: online sports coach, book a coach, mountain guide, sports professional, personal trainer
featurebox.featurebox_coach_meta_description: Find a coach or sports professional suited to your needs: fitness, mountain, nutrition and more.
